The easiest way to build a (d)app

Get started in five minutes. Our Starter Kits are preconfigured with all the tools you need. Hot reloading all the way—from React to Solidity—speeds up your development.

Build your (d)app
bash
http://localhost:3000/

Based on React, creating a decentralized application has never been easier. Our Starter Kits come with the most trusted technologies in the ecosystem: React, Ganache, Truffle, OpenZeppelin, and Infura.

Full Hot Reloading

Spend less time waiting and more time coding! Whenever you change a smart contract, it is automatically compiled, deployed, and upgraded locally so you can test it right away.

Minimal Configuration

Full app setup in less than five minutes. Get an out-of-the-box setup that connects with the best development tools in the ecosystem.

Learn by Doing

Some of our kits act as interactive tutorials that help you learn step by step how several parts of the stack work by changing the code appropriately.

Start the tutorial
STARTER KITS SUPPORT THE BEST TOOLS IN THE SPACE
Your blueprint for decentralized systems

Use vetted contractskeyboard_arrow_right

OpenZeppelin Contracts is a framework of modular, reusable, secure smart contracts for the Ethereum network, written in Solidity.

Automate your workflowkeyboard_arrow_right

Automate your Ethereum operations using OpenZeppelin Defender to deliver high-quality products faster with lower risk to users.

Join our community

Ask questions to our community, learn about security and become familiar with smart contract development.
